newsitem.title: FINLAND: RESEARCH ALERT - Kleinwort has UPM buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Kleinwort has UPM buy.

text.p: Dresdner Kleinwort Benson recommended "buy" for Finnish forestry group UPM-Kymmene Oy in its Pulp, Paper & Packaging Update research dated February 20.
"We continue to prefer those stocks which will benefit most from restructuring/cost cutting such as SCA, KNP BT, UPM-Kymmene and Mayr-Meinhof," Kleinwort said.

"We continue to prefer UPM-Kymmene," Kleinwort said. It saw UPM's paper and packaging interests with a 1997 price to cashflow of 2.6 times, or "a discount of 50 percent to the Nordic sector average which appears excellent value for Europe's leading producer." --Helsinki newsroom +358-9-680 50 245, e-mail news@reuters.fi
